revised_title: Trypanosome Diseases of Domestic Animals in Uganda: Trypanosoma nanum (Laveran)
tldr: The authors investigate the trypanosome diseases of domestic animals in Uganda, focusing on Trypanosoma nanum. They find that this trypanosome species is morphologically similar to Trypanosoma pecorum and does not infect smaller animals like monkeys, dogs, rats, or mice. The study also highlights the susceptibility of oxen and goats to the disease.
